definition: to break off relations/to break with sb
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Beck went plain crazy with anger on the day when he received his Dear John from his exgirlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 貝克收到他女朋友的絕交信的那天簡直都氣瘋了。

sentences.english: Inom gonna make him a suggestion he cannot refuse.
sentences.chinese: 我預備向他提出一個他不可能絕交的條件。

sentences.english: I have heard from my girlfriend , which makes me sad to death.
sentences.chinese: 我收到女友來的絕交信，令我傷心欲絕。

sentences.english: Since I found he cheated me , I finished with him.
sentences.chinese: 自從我發現他欺騙我，我就和他絕交了。

sentences.english: One hates to break with an old friend.
sentences.chinese: 人都不喜歡跟老朋友絕交。

sentences.english: I received a dear John letter from my girl friend which broke my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了女友寫來的令我心碎的絕交信。

sentences.english: I received a dear John Letter from my boy friend which broke my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我收到男友的絕交信，令我傷心愈絕。

sentences.english: Beck went plain crazy with anger on the day when he received his Dear John from his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 貝克收到他女朋友的絕交信的那天簡直都氣瘋了。

sentences.english: I received a dear john letter from my girl friend which broke my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我收到女友寄來的絕交信，今我傷心欲絕。

sentences.english: Jane gave Tom a Dear John letter.
sentences.chinese: 簡給湯姆寫了一封絕交信。

sentences.english: I received a dear John letter from my girl friend which broke m heart .
sentences.chinese: 我受到女友來的絕交信，令我傷心欲絕。

sentences.english: He just got a Dear John letter from his girlfriend, so he went to drown his sorrows in drink.
sentences.chinese: 他剛剛收到他女朋友的一封絕交信，因此他借酒消愁。

sentences.english: In this episode, we’ll focus on the negotiation phase.
sentences.chinese: 在這節課中，我們將要絕交協商階段。

sentences.english: Poor Tim received a Dear John letter while in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 可憐的蒂姆在瑞典時收到了一封絕交信。

sentences.english: Henceforth the Queen of Scots and the Countess of Shrewsbury were no longer friends.
sentences.chinese: 於是蘇格蘭女王和什魯斯伯裏伯爵夫人就此絕交。

definition: to have a falling out/to have a big argument
to fall out with sb/to become hostile
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
to be in a tangle/to nag
to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
hopelessly muddled/impossible to unravel
to sb's face/in sb's presence
to involve/to implicate/to be interrelated
to drift apart/to become estranged/to alienate/estrangement
(US-Soviet) Cold War
(coll.) shiver/shudder
cold war/(fig.) strained relationship/to be barely on speaking terms
to rupture/to burst open/to break/to break off relations with/a rupture
all smiles/smiling mischievously or ingratiatingly
to lose face/humiliation
to blush/to redden (with shame, indignation etc)
to lay one's cards on the table
